sub_topic: Identifying the isomorphism between two graphs.
message_1:
Identify whether the graphs G and H shown below are isomorphic. If they are, give the isomorphism mapping. If they are not, explain why.

G:

    1 — 2
    |   |
    3 — 4

H:

    A — B
    |   |
    C — D
message_2:
The graphs G and H are isomorphic. An isomorphism mapping between the two graphs can be given as follows:

1 → A
2 → B
3 → C
4 → D

This mapping preserves the adjacency between vertices, as the edges in graph G (1-2, 1-3, 2-4, 3-4) correspond to the edges in graph H (A-B, A-C, B-D, C-D) under this mapping.
